The image of the noble gryphon belies its true intent but not its power.

For 4 seconds after absorbing your Special's blast, deal more damage.

Strife herself once stole away with it, such was its destructive allure.

aspects.name: Aspect of Lucifer
aspects.description:
You have Igneus Eden*, which launches volatile Hellfire.

As he fell from grace, he nonetheless fought back in all his defiant fury.

(Total: 15)

upgrades.name: Flurry Fire
upgrades.description: Your Attack is faster and more accurate; gain +6 ammo capacity.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Spread Fire or Delta Chamber
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer
  • Reduce Attack cooldown to 60%

upgrades.name: Ricochet Fire
upgrades.description: Your attack bounces to +1 other foe
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Explosive Fire, Spread Fire, or Seeking Fire
  • Possibly Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer

upgrades.name: Spread Fire
upgrades.description: Your Attack becomes a short spread that deals 40 base damage; lose -6 ammo capacity.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Flurry Fire, Delta Chamber, Ricochet Fire, Seeking Fire or Concentrated Fire
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer
  • Reduce Attack range to 320
  • Increase Attack cooldown to 150%

upgrades.name: Explosive Fire
upgrades.description: Your Attack deals damage in an area and briefly slows foes.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Ricochet Fire or Piercing Fire
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer
  • Damage radius: 275

upgrades.name: Delta Chamber
upgrades.description: Your Attack is a 3-round burst; you never have to Reload.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Spread Fire, Flurry Fire or Concentrated Fire
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer
  • Cooldown between each shot: decreased to 0.035 sec
  • Cooldown between bursts of fire: 0.5 sec

upgrades.name: Piercing Fire
upgrades.description: Your Attack pierces foes and deals +50% damage to Armor.
upgrades.notes:
• Makes the Attack Unblockable and Piercing
  • Cannot be combined with Explosive Fire

upgrades.name: Triple Bomb
upgrades.description: You can use your Special 3 times in rapid succession.
upgrades.notes: • Cannot be combined with Cluster Bomb or Hazard Bomb

upgrades.name: Rocket Bomb
upgrades.description: Your Special is replaced with a rocket that deals 80 base damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Hazard Bomb
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer

upgrades.name: Targeting System
upgrades.description: Foes targeted by your Special move slower and take +30% damage.

upgrades.name: Hazard Bomb
upgrades.description: Your Special deals +300% base damage in a large area, but can hurt you.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Rocket Bomb, Cluster Bomb or Triple Bomb
  • Reduce range of Special to 10.
  • Increase damage radius to 145%
  • Deals 1% damage to Zag himself

upgrades.name: Cluster Bomb
upgrades.description: Your Special fires a spread of 5 bombs, but each deals -30% damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Hazard Bomb or Triple Bomb
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer
  • Reduce damage radius to 350
  • If used with Rocket Bomb, 5 rockets are fired in a 150° spread over about a second, firing right to left

upgrades.name: Concentrated Fire
upgrades.description: Your Attack deals +2 base damage for each uninterrupted hit to a foe.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Spread Fire or Delta Chamber
  • The damage bonus affects base damage. Thus it can be further enhanced by +% damage bonuses from boons and/or critical hit.
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Lucifer

upgrades.name: Seeking Fire
upgrades.description: Your Attack seeks the nearest foe and deals +10% damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Piercing Fire, Ricochet Fire, or Spread Fire
  • Incompatible with the Aspect of Lucifer

upgrades.name: Concentrated Beam
upgrades.description: Your Igneus Eden Attack damage to a foe ramps up +100% faster.
upgrades.notes:
• Aspect of Lucifer Exclusive
  • Cannot be combined with Eternal Chamber

upgrades.name: Flash Fire
upgrades.description: Your Igneus Eden Attack starts firing and fires +50% faster with +15% range.

upgrades.name: Triple Beam
upgrades.description: Your Igneus Eden Attack fires 3 beams in a spread pattern.

upgrades.name: Eternal Chamber
upgrades.description: Your Igneus Eden has ∞ ammo, but its damage no longer ramps.
upgrades.notes:
• Aspect of Lucifer Exclusive
  • Cannot be combined with Concentrated Beam

upgrades.name: Greater Inferno
upgrades.description: Your Igneus Eden Hellfire radiates +250% damage in a larger area.
